h2_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Final Encounter)
content: After you've defeated his clones and beaten the Macaque Chief one final time, the Destined One will stand victorious, but the evil energies of the seed sack will warp your mind, transforming you into that which you have sought to defeat!
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (Final Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
After you've defeated his clones and beaten the Macaque Chief one final time, the Destined One will stand victorious, but the evil energies of the seed sack will warp your mind, transforming you into that which you have sought to defeat!
